overview: Paul Pratt leads a cast of newbie jet set college boys who end up making the most out of a flight delay. Watch these hard bodied hunks take on your favorite boned up twinks: Kyle Ross, Jacobey London and Luke Allen. If you like older jocks banging the innocence out of tiny, adorable twins, then you'll watch this hard-core collection of scenes thats sure to put the laid in your layover fantasy.
title: Fratboy Layovers
